title: Akamai Provides Prolexic DDoS Service Impact Update (Status: Resolved)
description: Akamai experienced an outage for one of its Prolexic DDoS services (Routed 3.0) starting at 4:20 AM UTC. We detected the issue immediately, and impacted customers received an error alert within seconds. The impact was limited to Akamai customers using version 3.0 of the Routed service.
author: Akamai
